entry.title: Brandon Johnson Gives Away the Store to the Chicago Teachers Union
entry.summary: An act of corrupt self-dealing notable even in the history of a city famous for it.

entry.title: Time for a Humble Federal Reserve
entry.summary: The last thing the Fed should want is to be caught as flat-footed as it was in 2008.

entry.title: How the Courts Can Make Both the President and Congress Stronger
entry.summary: Effective presidents must work with Congress rather than go it alone. Fortunately, the courts have begun to encourage such cooperation.

entry.title: R Weekly 2024-W41 Generative Art, Word Templates, Expectations
entry.summary:
Hello and welcome to this new issue! How to have (my) content shared by R Weekly? This weekâ€™s release was curated by Colin Fay, with help from the R Weekly team members and contributors. Highlight Getting started with generative art 3MW (Using Word Templates With R) Expectations, Verified! Dive into the World of Unit Tests with expect_*() Insights Using property-based testing in R R in the Real World Examining exams using Rasch models and assessment of measurement invariance R in Organizations A Guide to R Package Validation in Pharma What is GxP Validation in Clinical Software Development? New Packages ğŸ“¦ Go Live for More New Pkgs ğŸ“¦ --> ğŸ“¦ Keep up to date wtih CRANberries ğŸ“¦ Updated Packages ğŸ” Search on R-universe ğŸ” simaerep release 0.6.0 Videos and Podcasts Listen to the R-Weekly Highlights Podcast R Internationally A comunidade R fala portuguÃªs Tutorials Set up your own universe on R-universe AI code completion in Positron MLOps from Zero to Hero : Build your ML model Automated random variable distribution inference using Kullback-Leibler divergence and simulating best-fitting distribution Expectations, Verified! Dive into the World of Unit Tests with expect_*() A Safe Space for Learning How to Make Pull Requests Economic Calendar Getting started with generative art How to Split Data into Equal Sized Groups in R: A Comprehensive Guide for Beginners Mastering Data Manipulation in R: Comprehensive Guide to Stacking Data Frame Columns 3MW (Using Word Templates With R)

Hello and welcome to this new issue! How to have (my) content shared by R Weekly? This weekâ€™s release was curated by Tony ElHabr, with help from the R Weekly team members and contributors. entry.summary: The union is abandoning its traditional members for new recruits in higher education, causing it to embrace left-wing causes its members donâ€™t care about.

entry.title: We Must Break the Cycle of Pandering
entry.summary: Voters deserve major-party candidates who treat them like grown-ups, telling them the truth rather than what they want to hear.

entry.summary: BRUCE SCHNEIER2024å¹´9æœˆ23æ—¥ Israelâ€™s brazen attacks on Hezbollah last week, in which hundreds of pagers and two-way radios exploded and killed at least 37 people, graphically illustrated a threat that cybersecurity experts have been warning about for years: Our international supply chains for computerized equipment leave us vulnerable. And we have no good means to defend ourselves. ä¸Šå‘¨ï¼Œä»¥è‰²åˆ—å¯¹çœŸä¸»å…šå‘åŠ¨äº†å…¬ç„¶è¢­å‡»ï¼Œæ•°ç™¾å°å¯»å‘¼æœºå’Œå¯¹è®²æœºç›¸ç»§çˆ†ç‚¸ï¼Œé€ æˆäº†è‡³å°‘37äººæ­»äº¡ï¼Œè¡€æ·‹æ·‹åœ°å±•ç¤ºäº†ç½‘ç»œå®‰å…¨ä¸“å®¶ä»¬å¤šå¹´æ¥ä¸€ç›´åœ¨è­¦å‘Šçš„å¨èƒï¼šæˆ‘ä»¬çš„ç”µè„‘åŒ–è®¾å¤‡çš„å›½é™…ä¾›åº”é“¾è®©æˆ‘ä»¬æ˜“å—æ”»å‡»ã€‚è€Œä¸”ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ²¡æœ‰å¥½çš„æ‰‹æ®µæ¥ä¿æŠ¤è‡ªå·±ã€‚ Though the deadly operations were stunning, none of the elements used to carry them out were particularly new. The tactics employed by Israel, which has neither confirmed nor denied any role, to hijack an international supply chain and embed plastic explosives in Hezbollah devices have been used for years. â€¦

The Japanese government and Tokyo Electric Power Company, which operated the Fukushima plant and is overseeing its cleanup, have assured the public that the water is safe for human consumption. åšå‡ºå®£å¸ƒä¹‹â€¦

entry.title: R Weekly 2024-W38 surreal package, gender in Australian census, version-ing data
entry.summary: Hello and welcome to this new issue! How to have (my) content shared by R Weekly? This weekâ€™s release was curated by Ryo Nakagawara, with help from the R Weekly team members and contributors. Highlight {surreal} 0.0.1: Create Datasets with Hidden Images in Residual Plots Gender and sexuality in Australian surveys and census Please Version Data Insights Thank You, Joseph Rickert: A Legacy of Leadership and Innovation in the R Community Empowering Data Science: How R is Transforming Research in Cameroon Labels For Technical Writing Projects R in the Real World Please Version Data Express to Impress: Leveraging IBCS Standards for Powerful Data Presentations Gender and sexuality in Australian surveys and census R in Organizations Takeaways from the R/Pharma Summit at posit::conf(2024) Resourceâ€¦
